column4: hmm i tried googling it but i cant find it so here it goes, what the hell is up with respawning too fast error in installing ubuntu??

unfortunately, it's a separate CD image you have to download and burn. Does anyone know why they don't build it into the live CD too?
holy cupcake, i'll just install the server version then
can I do that using the desktop and apt get the server apps?
you can apt-get basically everything. Is it LAMP you want for the server?
here's a LAMP guide: http://www.howtoforge.com/ubuntu_lamp_for_newbies   I think I used a different one when I set up my LAMP server, but that one looks like it should work
